pizzas.name: Margherita Classica
pizzas.description: San Marzano tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil, and olive oil.

reviews.comment: Perfect classic. Fresh basil and amazing crust.

pizzas.name: Pepperoni Supreme
pizzas.description: Premium pepperoni, mozzarella, and signature tomato sauce.

reviews.comment: Cheese pull is insane. Pepperoni is premium.
Great flavor, would love a spicier option.

pizzas.name: Quattro Formaggi
pizzas.description: Mozzarella, gorgonzola, parmesan, and fontina for cheese lovers.

reviews.comment: Loved it. A bit heavy but delicious.

pizzas.name: Garden Delight
pizzas.description: Seasonal veggies, pesto, and creamy ricotta.

reviews.comment: Fresh and light. Pesto + ricotta is perfect.

pizzas.name: Meat Feast
pizzas.description: Pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ham for serious meat lovers.

reviews.comment: Meaty and satisfying. Great crust too.

pizzas.name: Truffle Mushroom
pizzas.description: Wild mushrooms, truffle cream sauce, and aged parmesan.

reviews.comment: Feels like a gourmet restaurant pizza.
Truffle flavor is perfect, not overpowering.

pizzas.name: Spicy Diavola
pizzas.description: Fiery nduja, spicy salami, calabrian chili, and a honey drizzle.

reviews.comment: ðŸ”¥ Perfect heat level and amazing flavor.
Spicy and sweet together is great.

pizzas.name: Hawaiian Paradise
pizzas.description: Sweet pineapple meets savory ham over mozzarella and sauce.

reviews.comment: Love pineapple on pizza. Solid choice.

pizzas.name: BBQ Chicken Crunch
pizzas.description: Smoky BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, red onion, and cilantro.

pizzas.name: Buffalo Ranch Chicken
pizzas.description: Buffalo sauce, chicken, ranch drizzle, and mozzarella.

reviews.comment: Spicy + ranch is the perfect combo.

pizzas.name: Veggie Primavera
pizzas.description: Zucchini, cherry tomatoes, peppers, olives, and basil.

reviews.comment: Super fresh veggies and great taste.

pizzas.name: Spinach Ricotta Bliss
pizzas.description: Garlic cream base, spinach, ricotta, and parmesan.

reviews.comment: Creamy and perfect. Ricotta is amazing.

pizzas.name: Classic Mushroom Melt
pizzas.description: Mushrooms, mozzarella, garlic butter, and thyme.

reviews.comment: Mushroom flavor is rich and delicious.

pizzas.name: Sausage & Peppers
pizzas.description: Italian sausage, roasted peppers, onions, and mozzarella.

pizzas.name: Smoked Turkey & Pesto
pizzas.description: Smoked turkey, pesto drizzle, mozzarella, and cherry tomatoes.

pizzas.name: Calabrian Heat
pizzas.description: Calabrian chili, spicy salami, mozzarella, and tomato sauce.

reviews.comment: Real heat, real flavor. Love it.

pizzas.name: Mediterranean Olive
pizzas.description: Kalamata olives, feta, oregano, cherry tomatoes, and olive oil.

reviews.comment: Feta + olives is a perfect combo.

pizzas.name: Garlic Parmesan Chicken
pizzas.description: Garlic butter base, chicken, parmesan, and mozzarella.

pizzas.name: Tomato Burrata
pizzas.description: Cherry tomatoes, burrata, basil, and balsamic glaze.

reviews.comment: Burrata makes it super creamy and fresh.

pizzas.name: Pesto Shrimp
pizzas.description: Pesto base, shrimp, cherry tomatoes, and mozzarella.

reviews.comment: Shrimp + pesto is a crazy good combo.

pizzas.name: Classic Tuna & Onion
pizzas.description: Tuna, red onion, olives, and mozzarella.

pizzas.name: Philly Steak
pizzas.description: Steak strips, peppers, onions, and a creamy cheese sauce.

reviews.comment: Steak is tender, sauce is perfect.

pizzas.name: Hot Honey Pepperoni
pizzas.description: Pepperoni with a hot honey drizzle and chili flakes.

pizzas.name: Cheesy Garlic Bread Pizza
pizzas.description: Garlic butter base, mozzarella blend, and parmesan crust.

pizzas.name: Basil Chicken Alfredo
pizzas.description: Alfredo base, chicken, basil, and parmesan.

pizzas.name: Smoky BBQ Brisket
pizzas.description: BBQ base, brisket, onion rings, and cheddar.

reviews.comment: BBQ flavor is strong (in a good way).

pizzas.name: Classic Margherita Bianca
pizzas.description: White pizza with mozzarella, ricotta, garlic, and basil.

pizzas.name: Spicy Veggie Volcano
pizzas.description: JalapeÃ±os, peppers, onions, olives, and chili flakes.

pizzas.name: Seafood Marinara
pizzas.description: Marinara base, shrimp, calamari, garlic, and herbs.

pizzas.name: Chocolate Dessert Pizza
pizzas.description: Nutella spread, strawberries, crushed hazelnuts, powdered sugar.

reviews.comment: Dessert pizza is a win. So good.
Sweet and fun. Great for sharing.
